name: Pinball Fantastic
summary:
Pinball Fantastic is the cutest mobile pinball game ever! It's a pick up and play action pinball game, filled with rainbows and happiness!
The cutest creatures in pinball await you. Rewarding mechanics and an original soundtrack will tickle your happy bones!
Tap the left and right side of your device to flip the flippers. Obtain the Final Star from each boss to finish the level. Receive a multiplier bonus determined by how fast you obtain the Final Star.
Good Luck!
